text: Neunkirchen () is a municipality in the Miltenberg district in the Lower Franconia region in Bavaria, Germany and a member of the Administrative Community of Erftal, whose seat is in Bürgstadt. == Geography == === Place === Neunkirchen is in the Geo-Naturpark Bergstraße-Odenwald, between Wertheim and Miltenberg. === Constituent communities === Neunkirchen's Ortsteile are Neunkirchen, Richelbach and Umpfenbach. == References == == Other websites == * Community’s official webpage Category:Miltenberg (district)
title: Neunkirchen, Lower Franconia
